Hey Guys, just to make it fair.  I'm going to go into your other RPG 
group, enter and talk about joining this one. OK, That's fair.  Now 
if you want to keep talking about it, go through private email OK?  
Please guys?  I want to RPG as much as the next guy, but, this isn't 
very nice.  please go to private email on this stuff.  Thank you.



Logo
